info.description: This is a demo vue component in Mantle to for GLBE-7389. This component should be used for reference material and eventually deleted once we have better examples of Vue Components in Mantle and other verticals.
info.documentation:
This example uses evaluated js and a single file vue component to allow verticals to override properties in a inherited vue component. This setup assumes only one vue app of this type is on the page.
The component has the following properties:
* text `object` - The data object set in the Vue app/parent component. The child component uses demo-vue-header.vue and the fields are specified in the vue file

property.name: subHeader
property.value: This is an example of a VueJs app running withing globe that has this field overidden in the info tag.

property.name: subHeader
property.value: This is an example of a VueJs app running within Globe that has this field overidden from XML.
